CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains warm-up task to MOT . CHI sits in the center of the room playing with the jack+in+the+box and MOT sits in chair by the door
the clown pops up from the jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes clown down into jack+in+the+box . <aft> CHI pushes the clown back down again
